title: Can Ghidra show a function footer in the Listing window
content:
In both IDA and Ghidra have a very nice beginning of function marker text Ghidra: 
**************************************************************
*                          FUNCTION                          * 
**************************************************************
IDA: 
; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
what I am struggling with is the lack of end function marker in Ghidra IDA: 
; End of function eyefi_cmd_o
am I missing a configuration option?

answers_data.content:
You may achieve that by choosing: 
Edit
->
Tool Options
->
Listing Fields
->
Format Code
and selecting 
Flag Function Exits
field. An example how it works is given below:
